reviews.review: Just a really enjoyable game, there's not much else to say than think, shoot the portals, move tot he next test chamber, and repeat, it's fun.

This is the game to introduce to new players of the fps-genre as it has a good tutorial and never (except the ending) puts a time limit on how long it takes to complete a puzzle. On top of that the game is funny, and has a good story which will keep newcomers playing, even if they dont like doing puzzles.

Portal это игра на вечер или два, но это далеко не минус. Я не чуть не пожалел, что уделил ей время.
    Основная механика крутиться вокруг порталов. Игрок, при помощи портальной, пушки должен пройти 19 камер, решая разные задачи, которые постепенно усложняются. Опять же, механик не много, но игра не долгая, так что геймплэй не надоедает.
    Сюжет простой и короткий, но способен удивить, особенно тех кто вообще не играл в Portal, также атмосфера одиночества постоянно угнетает. Лично мне понравилось. Не буду спойлерить.
    Графика старая, однако приятно глазу. Саундтрэка мало.
    Ещё один минус это озвучка, и дело не в неприятном голосе ГЛэДОС, а в техническом исполнении.Некоторые фразы прерываются и это бесит. Не всё так плохо, но всё же.
    Советую купить вместе с Portal 2. Саму игру я рекомендую.

This game has an amazing story line and is a great puzzle solving game, I have loved it for years!

Portal is different enough from any other "puzzle" RPG and better than most to make it worth your time. Other people have written enough about it to make that clear.

Both the visuals and the sound effects are very well done (typical of any Valve game), and the main antagonist is... quite fascinating to say the least.

A classic already, and the game ports run well on all three major operating systems.

The developer commentary also adds to the replay value.
Half-Life 2 is a 2004 first-person shooter game developed by Valve. Wait wrong game

The ''story campaign'' of this game is notably short, spanning no more than 3 hours for a newcomer. However, if what you aim to do is a 'complete' run, including also the bonus advanced levels and the special challenges, you may get 10-16 hours depending how long it takes for you to figure the challenges out, since those are particularly hard.

The story part is composed of 19 fairly short levels, then you have 6 advanced levels that are some of the base story levels with small changes that make them harder to beat. Then you have the challenges, 3 types of challenges (beat a level with the least steps taken, the least portals placed or in the least time) over 6 base story levels. The challenges do change how you play a level quite a bit, so while you may have seen the level before, you won't go through it the same way at all, and it will feel somewhat fresh.

Overall, this game is usually considered a ''must play'' classic of the puzzle platformer genre, and it's a piece of gaming history worth knowing. 

I'd recommend getting it on a sale (those are fairly common for this game because of its age) in a bundle with it's second volume, which is similar to the first one but with a whole new campaign, bonus levels and coop multiplayer levels. If you do that, the value you'll get will be more than worth every cent!

Absolutely, hands down, one of the best games I've played. Having the silent protagonist adds much more to the story than you'd think, and you get most of the lore by hidden rooms and windows on the walls as you go along, which I adore. As late as I am to this, I still believe that Portal is a must-play for anyone who owns Steam. Even after finishing, I'm still able to replay it and go through the test chambers having as much fun as I did when I first played. If you are reading this and you have a computer, you have to play this game.
This game is very good at making you feel dumb, then smart, then dumb again.

o jogo é daora 

(eu pessoalmente não recomendo jogar por muito tempo seguido pois pode dar tontura e até nauseas)

(não passei por isso jogando o 2)

TLDR: One of the best game series to touch the platform.

Graphics:
Outdated, but what do you expect from a game this old?

Storyline:
Everyone knows it, it's simply iconic. Probably the best storyline for a game that I've played to date.

Price:
It's not amazing. At full price you'll get around 20 minutes of gameplay per dollar spent. Definitely grab it on a sale.

Difficulty:
Despite its age, the game is still somewhat challenging and a great introduction game to newcomers to gaming.

AI:
Fitting for its age.

Cutscenes:
Cutscenes weren't used often, but the game prefers to rather use what I'd call interactive cutscenes. Visual events are all around you while you do things.

Fun:
One of the best puzzle games on Steam. I had a blast playing it.

Sounds/Music:
Amazing sound track.

Replayability:
I'm not usually a fan of replaying games and I plan to replay this game soon.

Controls:
Despite its age, Portal has to be one of the best controlling games I've played. Please please please other studios take notes.

Performance:
Will run on anything.

Modding:
Any idea you can think of exists as a mod.

Selling Out:
There is no selling out, it's completely clean.

Similar Games:
Of course the sequel Portal 2, but also Q.U.B.E. 2.

Bugs:
I experienced none
It is an amazing game of puzzles. Yes, it is very challenging but, it has great game play. I highly recommend it.

Portal - это одна из моих любимых игр. Она офигенная во всех смыслах. Идея - 10/10. Портальная пушка (как оружие) - 9/10. Ну в движке соурс нема сомнения. Прошёл игру 21 раз. Одним словом игра огонь ставлю ей 9/10. Всем советую сыграть!!!
